lead_paragraph: In the latest in a series of videos, Israel’s prime minister assailed Palestinian leaders’ opposition to new West Bank settlements.

headline.print_headline: Netanyahu Draws Fire After Saying Palestinians Support ‘Ethnic Cleansing’
headline.main: Benjamin Netanyahu Draws Fire After Saying Palestinians Support ‘Ethnic Cleansing’

snippet: In the latest in a series of videos, Israel’s prime minister assailed Palestinian leaders’ opposition to new West Bank settlements....
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu draws sharp domestic and international criticism following statements in provocative video series charging that Palestinian leadership in West Bank seeks to remove all Jews from Palestinian state through 'ethnic cleansing;' State Dept says it will address video directly with Israeli govenment, calling language in video 'inappropriate.'
